data.title: Films
data.meta_description: Films | Now showing movies, films and trailers dublin  | Light House Cinema Dublin Ireland | Lighthouse cinema, Dublin, view current and upcoming screenings.  Browse movie times, watch movie trailers, find cinema deals, and book your cinema tickets online today.
